Greetings from Patondekar Jewellers! 

 In our day to day Gold-Silver business activities, every Customer comes up with different set of choices. Purity of the product and millions of Design options, these two aspects makes our business so popular. Over past 4 decades our 3 generations have taken up these business on great heights. Providing a perfect combination of Modernization and traditional gold rituals to our Customers is our identity which makes us really proud. To take this identity on a higher level we are here with more energy and enthusiasm presenting thousands of new design collections of attractive Gold Jewelleries. 

 So, come on Let's walk together hand-in-hand and be our Profession Companion!
